modName: DARK PRIEST - Class Build aka Character Preset -
summary:
No need for login to download, No mods required, Nor SKSE required, Easy Instal & everyrhing explained!!!
Starting at Guardian Stones, lvl 1, fresh from Helgen, not a single quest started or finished! complete build, with complete set of chosen armor, weapons, and skills!
descriptionHtml:
NO NEED FOR LOGIN TO DOWNLOAD!

Starting at Guardian Stones, level 1, fresh from Helgen, not a single quest started! Complete build, with complete set of chosen armor, weapons, and skills! You can choose Male, or Female version from folder! It is recomended to keep given equipment, since I was aiming to put ¨endgame¨
stuff that best suits this class in its looks and abilities!


Few months ago, I was watching few Skyrim class build videos on Youtube, but I wasnt entertained for long, because I wanted to try on different builds, but  it would take ages to level up and get all equipment they were showing! Also, I was deeply disappointed later, since they ran out of ideas, and started presenting characters that were heavy modded, with custom modded spells and equipment, flapping around with their ¨Tropical-space-supercute-chibi Elf Stormwalker-voidNinja-Nightblade¨ wielding ¨flaming katanas of thousand truths¨, so yeah...
LATER ON, I came across some YT videos with F-ing misleading Thumbnails of that videos! - For example, I saw video with thumbnail of da frquing NECROMANCER build, with some cool awesome hooded dude in some nice black outfit, with some green glowing scythe, but when i clicked on video, necromancer was actualy wearing Arch-Mages fur-carpet-looking robe, and wielding some toothpick...
SO, I came on idea of making my own class builds, and well, I used only armor and weapons, and spells, n all other stuff that exist in game!!! no mods!

-------------------------

REQUIREMENTS!!!

-NEWEST VERSION OF GAME! / NEWEST UPDATE! (IT WILL NOT WORK IF YOU HAVE OLDER VERSIONS! MY VERSION IS 1.9.32.0 - so i think that would be update 13)

-SKYRIM WITH ALL DLCs! (I USE LOTS OF EQUIPMENT FROM DLCs, SO YOU NEED TO HAVE ALL DLCs - DG, HF, DB)

-LOTS OF TIME! (SINCE BUILDS ARE REAL FUN, SO, TAPE YOUR PISSPOT/BEDPAN TO YOUR ARSE, AND SAY GOODBYE TO SUNLIGHT :D )

-NO NEED OF SKSE(Skyrim Script Extender) OR ANY OTHER ADDON OR MOD OR ANYTHING!

-------------------------

INSTRUCTIONS!!!

STEP 1: CHOOSE MALE OR FEMALE CHARACTER ¨Dark Priest F - Discordia<for female> or Dark Priest M - Dante<for male>¨, DOWNLOAD FILE, ITS .ZIP, SO YOU NEED WINZIP OR 7Z OR SOME OTHER PROGRAM TO OPEN IT - PIECE OF CAKE.

STEP 2: OPEN ZIP,  THEN YOU WILL SEE .ESS FILE NOW FOLLOW STEP 3.

STEP 3: FIND FOLDER OF YOUR SAVES(BY DEFAULT ITS IN ¨Documents/My Games/Skyrim/Saves¨) AND PUT THAT .ESS FILE IN THAT ¨Save¨ FOLDER, ADN THATS ABOUT THAT, START GAME AND ENJOY!!!

-------------------------

ABOUT THIS CLASS
-Main Skills: Restoration, Conjuration
-Abilities: Conjure Mistman, Conjure Wrathman, Spectral Arrow, Poison rune, Undead Healing and healing for slef & others. Uses a pretty mace enchanted for banishing summoned and turning undead creatures! very nice piece of armor with heavy boots and gloves, check it out!
-Name: Dante - male / Discordia - female
-Specialisation: Magic
-Karma: Good

-This is my first upload, and I am bringing to you DARK PRIEST, a shadowy figure, striking evil and banishing its abominations by using dark magic and curses! He/She is part of ¨Knights of the Circle¨ a militaristic arm of the Order of Arkay. Conjuring spirits of underworld to pull their misused kin back to spiritual plane! Some say that you can't fight fire with fire, but in this case, it showed more than useful!

~~~READ THIS~~~
Soon (tomorrow probably) I will make YT video of this class, describing its skills and background in more details, but well, it will be only suggestive background, I will leave Role-Play to you, since that is true quality and magic of TES games.
I have somewhere around 20 classes ready to come on Nexus and on Youtube very soon! I really really poured my soul and feelings in this work, and I truly hope you will enjoy it!!!

~~~IMPORTANT~~~ All class I made are OP (Overpowered) almost god-classes, but well, not quite, so if you play on higher difficulties, you will notice little difference, so as I was saying, classes are OPed, you have 3000 points distributed in Health Stamina(fatigue) and Magicka - WHICH MEANS THAT YOU HAVE, FOR EXAMPLE 1000 HEALTH 1000MANA AND 1000 STAMINA, NOT 3000 IN EACH (there are few exceptions where you have up to 3200 points, its in those classes in which I put all points to one stat)... ALSO - MAIN SKILLS ARE MAXED TO 100, SO IF YOU DONT LVL OTHER SKILLS, YOU WONT LVL UP MUCH, BUT EVERY TES PLAYER KNOWS THAT THIS IS NOT OF GREAT IMPORTANCE, SINCE IT WILL NOT DISABLE YOU IN ANY WAY, THERE ARE ONLY FEW QUESTS THAT REQUIRE LVLING (for example quest for museum in Dawnstar, Boethiah's quest, quest for ebony blade, which i never use, because its dumb to kill 10 followers, and few more I cant think of in this moment) IT WAS INTENDED TO BE THIS WAY, SO DONT BITCH AROUND...

~~~EVEN MORE IMPORTANT~~~
IM WARNING YOU, DO NOT ATTEMPT TO STEAL IDEAS OR PUT VIDEOS OF THIS CLASS ON YOUTUBE, YOU DONT HAVE PERMISSION TO MODIFY OR USE THIS FILE IN YOUR MODS AND THEN PUT IT ON YOUTUBE OR NEXUS, SIMPLY BECAUSE ITS NOT SOME CODE OR MOD YOU CANNOT CREATE YOURSELF!!! I PUT MORE THEN FEW THINGS IN THIS SAVE THAT CAN PROVE THAT I MADE THIS, SO IF YOU DONT WANT TO RUIN YOUR YOUTUBE CHANEL OR NEXUS ACCOUNT DONT STEAL!

Special Thanks to:
LoreCraft
Zola
Jovan
and special thanks to my fiancee Marina for enduring me!
author: LoreCraft
